\begin{tabular}{|c|c|}

\hline
Step & Description \\
\hline
1 & **Implement strong passwords and multi-factor authentication:**  Require users to create complex passwords and enable multi-factor authentication for all accounts to prevent unauthorized access.  \\
\hline
2 & **Update software and operating systems regularly:**  Patches often address known vulnerabilities that hackers could exploit.  Keep all systems updated to minimize security risks. \\
\hline
3 & **Use a firewall:**  A firewall acts as a barrier between your network and the outside world, blocking unauthorized traffic.  Configure it to allow only necessary connections. \\
\hline
4 & **Educate employees on cybersecurity best practices:**  Train employees to recognize phishing attempts, avoid suspicious links, and follow proper data handling procedures. \\
\hline
5 & **Conduct regular penetration testing:**   Simulate real-world attacks to identify vulnerabilities in your network and strengthen your defenses.  \\
\hline
\end{tabular}
\end{center}


Remember, it is crucial to prioritize network security and act responsibly when it comes to cybersecurity.
